annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 9, 2002, D.C. Law 14-193, § 2(b), 49 DCR 7334

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 262(c) of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-481, Nov. 18, 2014, 61 DCR 12133, 20 STAT 4405).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 262(c) of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-7, Feb. 26, 2015, 62 DCR 2646, 21 STAT 807).
